mapper.select: select u.id,name,sno,account from xcs_cf_points.user u left join xcs_cf_points.score s on u.id = s.uid group by u.id order by u.id asc

select u.id, name, sno, account from xcs_cf_points.user u left join xcs_cf_points.score s on u.id = s.uid where name like concat('%', #{searchValue},'%') or sno like concat('%', #{searchValue},'%') or account like concat('%', #{searchValue},'%') group by u.id order by u.id asc

select u.id id, name, sno, account, ifnull(sum(duringScore), 0) + ifnull(sum(afterScore), 0) score from xcs_cf_points.user u left join xcs_cf_points.score s on u.id = s.uid where name like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%') or sno like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%') or account like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%') group by u.id order by u.id asc
